Masaryk University | Department of Economics

Lipová 41a | 60200 Brno | Czech Republic

\

I am an assistant professor at the [Department of Economics](https://www.econ.muni.cz/en/about-us/organizational-structure/561100-deptof-economics) of the [Faculty of Economics](https://www.econ.muni.cz/en), [Masaryk University](https://www.muni.cz/en), and member of [Health Economics, Policy, and Innovation Institute](https://hepii.econ.muni.cz/en) (HEPII). 

My research focuses on applied microeconomics and health economics.
